articles.title: JuJu Watkins scores 51 of No. 15 USC's 67 points in upset of No. 4 Stanford - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: JuJu Watkins is 18 years old and just broke a 35-year-old USC scoring record.
articles.content:
JuJu Watkins was unstoppable on Friday. (AP Photo/Josie Lepe)
JuJu Watkins has looked like a special talent since her first game at No. 15 USC, but she took it to another level on Friday.

articles.content:
